emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group of teenagers, including Robert "Sonny" Kilgore seated in center, in home of Charles P. Pernell, Bryn Mawr Road, Upper Hill District
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper September 14, 1946, pg. 18, reads: "Teen-Agers Feted - The home of Mr. and Mrs. Charles P. Pernell of Bryn Mawr Road was the scene of a gay teen-agers party given in honor of the Pernell's nephew, Robert (Sonny) Kilgore (seated, center) last Friday. A student of Benjamin Franklin School in Philadelphia, 'Sonny" spent his vacation in Pittsburgh. - Harris Photo."
